name: melody-auth
tagline: An authentication service for managing users tokens and SSO
description: Melody Auth is an authentication service designed for SSO and user/token management. It supports OAuth2 and a minimal admin UI for managing users, apps, and permissions in self-hosted environments.

features.title: Oauth2 Provider
features.description: Implement single sign-on for multiple applications with OAuth2 protocol support

features.title: User Management
features.description: Create and manage user accounts with profiles, passwords, and permissions

features.title: Token Management
features.description: Issue and validate access tokens and refresh tokens for authenticated sessions

features.title: Admin Interface
features.description: Manage users, applications, and permissions through a web-based admin panel

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Enhance security with TOTP-based two-factor authentication

features.title: Session Management
features.description: Track active user sessions and provide logout functionality
